item.description: Wednesday is "Chick-fil-A Appreciation Day." Visit an outlet in Burlington, Peabody or Nashua (NH) to support right of owners to hold and make known traditional values and open an outlet wherever they deem it makes business sense. Visit www.chick-fil-a.com/Locations/ for address of locations and hours. (Not open Sundays to observe Christian 'sabbath'). I plan to be at the  Burlington location at noon, but if that's not possible stop in when you can. (One member will be there around 6 pm)
item.name: Support liberty at Chick-fil-A
